definition: addicted to a drug, a person who relies on another person for support (especially financial support)
details:
adjective
- addicted to a drug
= synonyms: dependant, drug-addicted, hooked, strung-out
- contingent on something else
= synonyms: dependant, qualified
- relying on or requiring a person or thing for support, supply, or what is needed
= example: relying on or requiring a person or thing for support, supply, or what is needed
- (of a clause) unable to stand alone syntactically as a complete sentence
= example: (of a clause) unable to stand alone syntactically as a complete sentence
= synonyms: subordinate
- being under the power or sovereignty of another or others
= synonyms: subject
- held from above
= synonyms: pendent, pendant
noun
- a person who relies on another person for support (especially financial support)
= synonyms: dependant
